trans-unit.source: Defines constants that indicate how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 定義常數，以指出如何<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>隨即出現。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> types to indicate the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>類型以指出資料格的外觀時，就會在編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, the cell displays the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在編輯模式中，資料格會顯示主控<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> mimics the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 它不是處於編輯模式時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>模擬的外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed with a drop-down button but does not otherwise mimic the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 它不是處於編輯模式時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>下拉式按鈕就會顯示但否則模仿的外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed without a drop-down button.
trans-unit.target: 它不是處於編輯模式時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>下拉式按鈕不會顯示。
